content: this ribbed beanie crochet pattern uses simple stitches and stretches to fit multiple child and adult sizes this pattern is designed to meet the donation requirements of hats for sailors 1 an organization that distributes handmade hats to deployed sailors in united states navy and coast guard ships > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting flat in row crocheting in the back loop includes a link to a video tutorial seaming with the slip_stitch join includes video tutorials cinching a slouch hat closed includes link to a photo tutorial **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult 15 38 cm circumference at roll up brim 21 53 5 cm circumference for main part of hat x 12 30 5 cm height *this hat stretches to fit a range of teen and adult head sizes shown on a canvashead/welldone mannequin 3 with 22 5 57 cm head circumference * **materials** king cole wool aran 4 yarn 100% superwash wool 3 5 oz/100 g 196 yd/180 m 2 skeins in 5048 twilight *or approximately 275 yd 251 5 m in any medium weight wool or superwash wool yarn * us size i-9/5 5 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge * yarn needle stitch marker optional **gauge** 16 single_crochet = 4 10 cm across *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 http //www hatsforsailors com/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/02/26/angel-ribbed-crochet-beanie-pattern/ 3 https //tidd ly/3kyw8on 4 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/king-cole-wool-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=35c8ae00
